titleStmt.title: To his excellency the Lord Generall Cromwell. A few proposals, relating to civil government. / Humbly offered by John Rogers an unworthy servant of Christ, and preacher of the Gospel now at Tho. Apostles London.
titleStmt.author: Rogers, John, 1627-1665?

notesStmt.note: Dated and signed at end: From my study Tho. Apostles 25. day of the second month Ziu. 1653. Jo. Rogers.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
